name: 🅻🅸🆅🅸🅽🅶 🅽🅸🅶🅷🆃🅼🅰🆁🅴
description:
Living Nightmare is a top-down, bullet-hell RPG crossover with a rich story and beautiful pixel art visuals.

You follow a young boy named LAIN who must survive the hostile world manifested in his dreams to break a curse and free himself of the darkness kept inside. With the help of your trusted guardian angel, can you end the Living Nightmare?

Features:
  • A free-to-play title with a twenty-minute runtime
  • Five chapters, with over fifteen unique areas 
  • Battle your way through the OTHERWORLD, and relive through the haunting memories of LAIN's life
  • Different enemy types and a boss battle
  • Switch between the two different playable characters - LAIN and the ANGEL
  • Solve the mysteries of LAIN's past, and figure out what's the source of the curse
Controls:
  • Movement - WASD
  • Weapon Direction - Mouse Cursor
  • Shoot Pencil - Left Mouse Click
  • Summon Angel - Space Bar
  • Interact - F
  • Pause Menu - Esc

Developed by Project Dream Team

Soundtrack by 12 Plus and Samuel Wang
